com.risk.team.services

Class RiskMapEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.team.services.RiskMapEdit

  • public class RiskMapEdit
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the user with the option to edit a Risk Game Map as per the rules prescribed in the game.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dhaval Desai

    • Method Detail

      • getMapObj

        public RiskMapRW getMapObj()
        Getter for fetching the RiskMapRW Object
        Returns:
        mapObj Object of type RiskMapRW

      • createEditMap

        public boolean createEditMap(boolean flag)
        This method allows creation of new map. The user can choose from 9 options: 1) Enter Map Tag 2) Add a Continent 3) Remove a Continent 4) Add a Country 5) Remove a Country 6) Add an Edge between Countries 7) Remove an Edge between Countries 8) Show Map Details 9) Save Map and Exit
        Parameters:
        flag - when set true creates a new map and when set false allows editing existing map.
        Returns:
        true if the map is created or editing successfully else returns false

      • checkAdjacency

        public boolean checkAdjacency()
        This method verifies whether the countries are adjacent to each other or not as per the Map file.
        Returns:
        true if the countries are adjacent to each other else returns false if they are not adjacent.

      • countCountriesInContinent

        public boolean countCountriesInContinent()
        This method verifies whether a particular continent has minimum 2 countries inside it.
        Returns:
        true if the continent has more than 2 countries inside it else returns false

      • addEditMapInfo

        public void addEditMapInfo(java.util.Scanner sc)
        This method allows to add or edit a Map Tag Information.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner Object which allows scanning input from the user.

      • removeBlankLines

        private void removeBlankLines(java.util.Scanner sc)
        This method is used for pre-processing the blank lines in the Map file.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner Object which allows scanning input from the user.

      • printMyMap

        private void printMyMap()
        This method is used to print the current map details
